headline: FirstEnergy: Making Good Progress While Putting Bribery Scandal Behind It
summary: FirstEnergy shows balance sheet repair, new CEO, 4.0% yield, valuation discount, AI data centers, dividend growth, and reduced debt. Read why FE stock is a buy.
